lines.text: When I want your opinion, I'll beat it out of you.
[Camacho and Cusack run into each other in a public building]
One day, I would like to give you a gift of a Columbian neck-tie.
[Camacho's underlings laugh]
It's very special. You slit the throat, pull out the tongue and on you, (Camacho laughs), it would look beautiful.

[smirking]
Why don't you give it to me right now?
Hey Sarge! You know how a Camacho's like a cue ball? Cause the harder you hit 'em, the better their English gets.
What do you do when you don't have someone?
You find someone!
[Noticing some painters going into an apartment]
What the hell are those guys up to?
Going to work, what do you think?
At this hour?
Don't worry about it. Let it roll! They've got a hard ass for a boss, just like us.
Take a shot, kid! Little nerve killing.
Look, I'm not nervous, all right, Cragie? I just gotta take a leak.
You gotta take a leak, do it now.
On some poor bastard's grave?
Who cares? If someone was smart, they'd rip out all these graves and plant tomatoes. These people are no good. They're dead!
Where's Cusack?
He's saving the world.
